content.question: Based on the laws of thermodynamics, which of the following is the applied mathematical routine used to estimate the biomass of the mice in the pyramid?

choices.label: <math alttext="18,705 kilograms times 10" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>18</mn><mtext>,705</mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>kg</mtext><mo>×</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="18,705 kilograms, divided by, 10 times 100" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>18</mn><mtext>,705</mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>kg/10</mtext><mo>×</mo><mn>100</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="18,705 kilograms times 0.10, times 0.10" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>18</mn><mtext>,</mtext><mn>705</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>kg</mtext><mo>×</mo><mn>0.10</mn><mo>×</mo><mn>0.10</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>
